action.action-desc: Mr. Lawler introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs

form.official-title: To amend the Diplomatic Security Act to require that congressional notifications relating to decisions to re-open high risk, high threat diplomatic posts include an explanation of the national security value of such decision.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Safe Embassies Act.

Paragraph (1) of section 105(b) of the Diplomatic Security Act (22 U.S.C. 4804(b)) is amended by inserting , including a detailed explanation of the national security value of re-opening such a post before the period at the end.
